mapper.select: select ef.id, ef.fecha_hora, ef.contenido, cm.id as cmt_id, cm.fecha_hora as cmt_fecha_hora, cm.contenido as cmt_contenido, autor.nombre as ef_nombre, autor.email as ef_email, autorcom.nombre as cmt_cm_nombre, autorcom.email as cmt_cm_email from ENTRADAS_FOROS as ef LEFT OUTER JOIN COMENTARIOS as cm ON ef.id = cm.ENTRADAS_FOROS_id INNER JOIN USUARIOS as autor ON autor.email=ef.USUARIOS_email LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS as autorcom ON autorcom.email=cm.USUARIOS_email

select ef.id, ef.fecha_hora, ef.contenido, cm.id as cmt_id, cm.fecha_hora as cmt_fecha_hora, cm.contenido as cmt_contenido, autor.nombre as ef_nombre, autor.email as ef_email, autorcom.nombre as cmt_cm_nombre, autorcom.email as cmt_cm_email from ENTRADAS_FOROS as ef LEFT OUTER JOIN COMENTARIOS as cm ON ef.id = cm.ENTRADAS_FOROS_id INNER JOIN USUARIOS as autor ON autor.email=ef.USUARIOS_email LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS as autorcom ON autorcom.email=cm.USUARIOS_email WHERE ef.id=#{idF} order by ef.fecha_hora

select ef.id, ef.fecha_hora from ENTRADAS_FOROS as ef LEFT OUTER JOIN COMENTARIOS as cm ON ef.id = cm.ENTRADAS_FOROS_id WHERE cm.contenido LIKE '%recorcholis%' OR cm.contenido LIKE '%carambolas%' ORDER BY ef.fecha_hora
